video codec:
MPEG1

video cli:
-vcodec mpeg1video -an -b:v 384000 -intra_matrix 8,9,12,22,26,27,29,34,9,10,14,26,27,29,34,37,12,14,18,27,29,34,37,38,22,26,27,31,36,37,38,40,26,27,29,36,39,38,40,48,27,29,34,37,38,40,48,58,29,34,37,38,40,48,58,69,34,37,38,40,48,58,69,79 -inter_matrix 16,18,20,22,24,26,28,30,18,20,22,24,26,28,30,32,20,22,24,26,28,30,32,34,22,24,26,30,32,32,34,36,24,26,28,32,34,34,36,38,26,28,30,32,34,36,38,40,28,30,32,34,36,38,42,42,30,32,34,36,38,40,42,44 -bf 2 -mbd bits -cmp 2 -subcmp 2 -mbcmp 2 -ildctcmp 2 -precmp 2 -skipcmp 2 -trellis 1 -vtag MPEG
